rules: Headings (Playfair Display): Use for all Section Titles, Hero Text, and Card Titles. Font weights: 600 or 700. Tracking: tight.
Body (Manrope): Use for descriptions, navigation, and general text. Font weights: 300 (light) or 400 (regular). Tracking: normal.
Data/Mono (JetBrains Mono): Use for Scores, Ranks, Dates, and Tags. Font weights: 400. Tracking: wide for uppercase labels.

usage.primary: Use Gold (#D4AF37) sparingly for 'Winner' highlights, active states, and primary CTAs.
usage.secondary: Use Deep Green (#102A20) for subtle backgrounds or success states.
usage.background: Deep Black (#020204) is the canvas. Never use pure black #000000.
usage.text: Off-white (#EDEDED) for readability. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF on large areas.

hero.content: Title: 'Excellence 2025'. Subtitle: 'Celebrating the visionaries defining the future.'
hero.visuals: Subtle gold glow or particle effect in background.

podium.layout: Flex row, center aligned. 1st place larger and center. 2nd and 3rd slightly smaller and to sides.
podium.card_style: Vertical, large avatar/image, gold border for 1st place.

leaderboard_list.card_style: Glassmorphism (bg-white/5), hover effect (border-gold/50), mono font for rank.

filters.style: Minimalist text tabs. No background pills unless active.
filters.active_state: Text color Gold, small dot indicator below.

grid.item_style: No border, sharp edges or minimal rounded-md. Hover: Zoom image slightly, show overlay with title/author.

lightbox.style: Full screen, backdrop-blur-xl. Image centered. Metadata on the side or bottom.

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Playfair Display'.
Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very subtle gold shimmer.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (text color change, scale, or border glow).
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Create the 'Results' page using the Podium and Leaderboard components.
3. Create the 'Gallery' page using the Masonry layout.
4. Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
5. Ensure the Dark Mode theme is applied globally.
6. Use Tailwind CSS for all styling, extending the config provided in the codebase.
